text: Rully, Calvados is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into (it became part of) the new commune of Valdallière.Arrêté préfectoral 13 October 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Rully, Calvados
